name: Residences
description:
Short Horror Experience

Story

You wake up outside on this strange residences, something happen and you can't remember anything. Can you escape?

Controls

-  WASD to move.

- Left Mouse Button to Interact.

- RIght Mouse Button to Turn On / Off Flashlight.

How to

-  Find keys and doors to find your way out.

- Avoid enemy that can move and enemy that invisible except their shadow.

- Find your escape.

Install

Download, unzip, and play, or play the browser version.

If the browser version ui is too big, try fullscreen.

Information

Hi there, thank you so much to come and try my game, this is my second game jam. I'm running out of time, but at least it can be played for Devindo Game Jam 2. Feedback is very much appreciated.
